TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CallbackDebugBehavior extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior

summary.span: 为 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 回调对象启用服务调试。

span.span: Enables service debugging for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) callback object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从应用程序配置文件中或以编程方式将 属性设置为 `true`，则可以使客户端回调对象中的托管异常信息回流到该服务，以便进行调试。Set the property to `true` from an application configuration file or programmatically to enable the flow of managed exception information in a client callback object back to the service for debugging purposes. > [!CAUTION] > 将托管异常信息返回到服务可能存在安全风险，因为异常详细信息会公开有关内部客户端实现的信息，而未经授权的服务可能会使用这些信息。Returning managed exception information to services can be a security risk because exception details expose information about the internal client implementation that could be used by unauthorized services. 此外，虽然 属性也可以通过编程方式进行设置，但在部署时容易忘记禁用 。In addition, although the properties can also be set programmatically, it can be easy to forget to disable when deploying. 由于涉及到一些安全问题，因此强烈建议您：Because of the security issues involved, it is strongly recommended that: - 使用应用程序配置文件将 属性的值设置为 `true`。You use an application configuration file to set the value of the property to `true`. - 仅在受控调试方案中才这样做。You only do so only in controlled debugging scenarios. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 相关的安全问题的托管的异常信息，请参阅[指定和处理在协定和服务中的错误](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services.md)。 the security issues related to managed exception information, see [Specifying and Handling Faults in Contracts and Services](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services.md). 你还可以通过以下方式设置此属性的值使用[ <callbackDebug> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/callbackdebug.md)客户端应用程序配置文件中的元素。You can also set the values of this attribute by using the [<callbackDebug>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/callbackdebug.md) element in a client application configuration file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个客户端配置文件，该文件指示 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 从 SOAP 消息中的客户端回调对象返回托管异常信息。The following code example shows a client configuration file that instructs [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] to return managed exception information from a client callback object in SOAP messages. [!code-xml[SCA.CallbackContract#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sca.callbackcontract/cs/client.exe.config#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool includeExceptionDetailInFaults) cil managed

param.name: includeExceptionDetailInFaults
param.span: 控制 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 回调对象是否在发送回服务的 SOAP 错误详细信息中包括托管异常信息。

span.span: Controls whether a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] callback object includes managed exception information in the detail of the SOAP faults sent back to the service.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数创建 对象，在该对象中， 属性的值为 `includeExceptionDetailInFaults` 的值。The constructor creates a object in which the value of the property is the value of `includeExceptionDetailInFaults`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值控制客户端回调对象是否将 SOAP 错误中的托管异常信息返回到服务。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that controls whether client callback objects return managed exception information in SOAP faults back to the service.

value.span: 如果 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 在双工通信中返回 SOAP 错误中的托管客户端回调异常信息，以便进行服务调试，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] returns managed client callback exception information in the SOAP faults for service debugging purposes in duplex communication; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从应用程序配置文件中或以编程方式将 属性设置为 `true`，则可以使客户端回调对象中的托管异常信息回流到该服务，以便进行调试。Set the property to `true` from an application configuration file or programmatically to enable the flow of managed exception information in a client callback object back to the service for debugging purposes. > [!CAUTION] > 将托管异常信息返回到服务可能存在安全风险，因为异常详细信息会公开有关内部客户端实现的信息，而未经授权的服务可能会使用这些信息。Returning managed exception information to services can be a security risk because exception details expose information about the internal client implementation that could be used by unauthorized services. 此外，虽然 属性也可以通过编程方式进行设置，但在部署时容易忘记禁用 。In addition, although the properties can also be set programmatically, it can be easy to forget to disable when deploying. 由于涉及到一些安全问题，因此强烈建议您：Because of the security issues involved, it is strongly recommended that: - 使用应用程序配置文件将 属性的值设置为 `true`。You use an application configuration file to set the value of the property to `true`. - 仅在受控调试方案中才这样做。You only do so only in controlled debugging scenarios. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 相关的安全问题的托管的异常信息，请参阅[指定和处理在协定和服务中的错误](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services.md)。 the security issues related to managed exception information, see [Specifying and Handling Faults in Contracts and Services](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services.md). ### 使用配置文件启用或禁用 CallbackDebugBehavio 的功能To enable or disable a feature of CallbackDebugBehavior using a configuration file 1. 添加`behaviorConfiguration`属性设为客户端[\<终结点 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13aa23b7-2f08-4add-8dbf-a99f8127c017)元素你[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]客户端应用程序。Add a `behaviorConfiguration` attribute to the client [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13aa23b7-2f08-4add-8dbf-a99f8127c017) element for your [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client application. 行为是终结点行为。The behavior is an endpoint behavior. 在上配置终结点行为``元素; 服务行为配置上[<服务>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md)元素。Endpoint behaviors are configured on `` elements; service behaviors are configured on [<service>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md) elements. 2. 将添加到或创建[ <endpointBehaviors> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpointbehaviors.md)部分，然后添加[<行为>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md) ，元素具有与匹配名称`behaviorConfiguration`步骤 1 中属性值。Add to or create an [<endpointBehaviors>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpointbehaviors.md) section and add a [<behavior>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md) element to that with the name that matches the `behaviorConfiguration` attribute value from step 1. 终结点行为添加在客户端中使用[\<终结点 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13aa23b7-2f08-4add-8dbf-a99f8127c017)元素使用[ <endpointBehaviors> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpointbehaviors.md)元素。Endpoint behaviors are added for use in a client [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13aa23b7-2f08-4add-8dbf-a99f8127c017) element using an [<endpointBehaviors>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpointbehaviors.md) element. 3. 添加[ <callbackDebug> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/callbackdebug.md)元素[<行为>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md)步骤 2 中的元素并启用或禁用各种属性使用适合于你的方案。Add a [<callbackDebug>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/callbackdebug.md) element to the [<behavior>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md) element from step 2 and enable or disable the various properties appropriate to your scenario. 有关具体示例的信息，请参见“示例”部分。For a specific example, see the Example section. 你还可以通过以下方式设置此属性的值使用[ <callbackDebug> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/callbackdebug.md)客户端应用程序配置文件中的元素。You can also set the values of this attribute by using the [<callbackDebug>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/callbackdebug.md) element in a client application configuration file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个客户端配置文件，该文件指示 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 从 SOAP 消息中的客户端回调对象返回托管异常信息。The following code example shows a client configuration file that instructs [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] to return managed exception information from a client callback object in SOAP messages. [!code-xml[SCA.CallbackContract#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sca.callbackcontract/cs/client.exe.config#4)]
